title: 怎么设置通过权限使用或合成物品

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
Perm
Description
essentials.build.break.<id>[:datavalue]Allows breaking of a block.essentials.build.craft.<id>[:datavalue]Allows crafting of an item.essentials.build.drop.<id>[:datavalue]Allows dropping of an item.essentials.build.interact.<id>[:datavalue]Allows interacting with a blocks or item.essentials.build.pickup.<id>[:datavalue]Allows collecting of an item.essentials.build.place.<id>[:datavalue]Allows placing a block.

replies.txt_content:
741815914@qq.co 发表于 2014-8-23 12:27
怎么ban，比如id 5，怎么ban合成
mangaddp 组 -essentials.build.craft.5

replies.author: Greensky
replies.txt_content: Essentials的具体权限我也不是很熟悉，不过记得应该是用essentials.build下面的各条权限实现的，通过在权限的前面加上下划线“-”就可以实现禁止某一条权限，详情参考Essentials官方百科
